name: The Child of the Forest
description:
The Child of the Forest is the product of a month's work for a 2020 Game Production class at the University of Central Florida made in Unreal Engine 4. The development team consisted of nine students: three artists, four programmers, and two level designers.

The premise is that a young witch must use her ghostly powers to reunite with her lost cat familiar by overcoming forest obstacles.

Development Team:
Laura Reyes - Creative Director, Artist (Character)
Audrey Luce - Producer, Artist (Environment), VFX
Thanapol Siriyuvasak - Audio, Artist, Cover Image Artist
Dylan Micheli - Programmer
Daniel Garcia - Co-Producer, Programmer
Giovanni Minus - Programmer
Cody Bolton - Programmer
Jemon Golfin - Programmer, Level Design
Trey Martinez - Level Design
